metadata.title: CVE-2021-32823 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: In the bindata RubyGem before version 2.4.10 there is a potentialdenial-of-service vulnerability. In affected versions it is very slow forcertain classes in BinData to be created. For example BinData::Bit100000,BinData::Bit100001, BinData::Bit100002, BinData::Bit<N>. In combinationwith <user_input>.constantize there is a potential for a CPU-based DoS. Inversion 2.4.10 bindata improved the creation time of Bits and Integers.

criterions.comment: ruby-bindata package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
